summary:
Hunter Home v1.0 .
See the images or read the long description for information.
descriptionHtml:
Hunter Home

- Description
- Permission
- Important Note

Description

Update 1.1

- Work in progress.


Version 1.0

- More weapons and armor whith custom textures and effect and more...

- New player home, in the forest, whit a pretty small dungeon.

- Small home whith basement, display area, and the \"Draconic Forge\".

- On the \"Draconic Forge\" you can craft these set (SET = Armor & Weapon): Blades Set, Imperial set, Wolf Set, Draug Set, Forsworn Set, Falmet Set and more..more..more.

- Display area whit weapon container, mannequin, dagger display, book shelf, weapon rack and display.

- Draconic Forge whith the \"Draconic Forge\", Enchanting Table, Tanning Rack, Armor Workbench and more.... 

- Wood chopping block whit Woodcutten Axe on the exterior.

- New dragon whit custom blue fluo textures, dont attack it, is friendly and strongest.

- Weapon created: Chill Glass sword , Scorched Glass Sword, Mystic Blade, Hunters Best Friend. All Craftable

- Armor created: New Acient nord Helmet, Blue Dragon Bone Set, Bone Crown (No Quest), Imperial General Armor, Studded Shield. All Craftable



- Permission
 
For me with this mod you can do what you want, except uploading to other sites.
If you can make this mod better try it yourself and then send the file if want to become part of the mod.

- Important Note

What else is there to say, download it and try it.

And endorse.

I already thought about doing the update.
If you find any bug please leave a comment I will fix it soon.
author: DonVito96
